924: 5+ month Contract Project Role | Part Time Fractional Remote out of the Minneapolis area $50 - $70 /hour W2 Pay Rate Ourly is looking for an Interim Controller to build cap tables, general ledger reconciliations, insurance accruals calculations, financial reporting, inter-company reconciliation, fixed asset management, management reporting. This consultant will need to learn the systems and ad hoc reporting functions in Xero and it would be helpful to have some past experience in energy, oil and gas or transportation. The ideal candidate has also experience collaborating on teams and loves the power of flexible work! Don’t meet every single requirement? Create a project profile anyways. Ourly.io is dedicated to making flexible work available for everyone. Studies have shown that women and people of color are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single qualification. If you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to create a project profile anyways. You may be just the right contract project professional for this or other roles. Requirements -Advanced Excel -Xero systems experience, preferred Benefits Paid Time Off (Vacation, Sick & Public Holidays) Training & Development 401k SafeHarbor Plan with a 3% contribution from Ourly.io
